Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.1.0-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.1.0-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers is earlier than 3.1.0-8, affected by CVE-2023-44487
